metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5112 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Development Tools panels of an extension are required to load URLs for thepanels as relative URLs from the extension manifest file but thisrequirement was not enforced in all instances. This could allow thedevelopment tools panel for the extension to load a URL that it should notbe able to access, including potentially privileged pages. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5112` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
